0.1.name: wordpress/collapsable-blogroll
0.1.description:
Collabsable Blogroll allows you to put your built-in blogroll on a page or in a post. The categories can be collapsed. No extra database table is needed. You can add new links as you did it in the past.

This plugin is based on Categorical Links Page (http://www.alucinari.net) by Jeremy Albrecht.
